QuestData.Title: Going, Going, Guano!
QuestData.Description: The bats native to Razorfen Kraul produce a very peculiar natural substance. Their guano's stench seems to send the Quilboar into a murderous frenzy - and this place reeks of it!$b$bI need you to find the bat cave, and bring me a suitable sample. If we can reverse the effects and produce an antidote, we may be able to save the Quilboar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ah, I see you have returned. Were you able to procure any Kraul Guano?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! This is just what we need, $n.
